Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection occurrences across all cases
Percentage of variants that include SW-Initial Reviewer Selection as a step in the process flow
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases

Name: Number of times SW-Initial Reviewer Selection is directly followed by SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection activities that occur before any reviewer-related reminder (e.g., Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 or 2)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases where 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' does not happen

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection relative to SW-Awaiting AE Assignment
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases where SW-Initial Reviewer Selection appears without eventually leading to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases where 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' does not happen

Name: Number of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection events that are succeeded by at least one instance of SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection that occurs within the first 24 hours after SW-Checklist Completed
Metric: the average of the function base < 24 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Ratio of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion across the entire log
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion'

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection in variants that ultimately result in SW-EIC Reject
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Reject' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection activities that are part of variants ending in an acceptance decision (e.g., RW-EIC Accept or SW-EIC Accept)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection events that are followed by a deadline-related activity (e.g., SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week'

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection compared to other initial coordination activities such as RW-Initial Reviewer Selection or RSW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'RW-Initial Reviewer Selection' occurs

Name: Number of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection occurrences per month to identify temporal patterns in reviewer assignment initiation
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'", 'aggregation': 'total', 'group_by': 'time:timestamp'}"
